Package com.sun.jini.tool.envcheck

Tool for examining the run-time environment of a Jini component.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Plugin A test plugin.
SubVMTask A subtask to be run in a separate VM.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPlugin Base class for plugins providing rudimentary I18N support
EnvCheck Tool used to perform validity checks on the run-time environment of a client or service.
Reporter A class which provides a standard way to report the results of a test.
Reporter.Message A container of message information to be processed by Reporter.
SubVM A container for a subtask which runs in a separate and returns a single object by writing that object to System.out.
Util Miscellaneous utility methods for use by the checking framework and plugins.
 

Package com.sun.jini.tool.envcheck Description

Tool for examining the run-time environment of a Jini component.
